mapper.select: SELECT b.nid, b.title, CASE WHEN b.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.count, b.likes, a.nickname as writer FROM info_notice b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno ORDER BY b.nid DESC LIMIT #{skiprow}, #{pagerow}

SELECT b.nid, b.title, b.regdate, b.content, a.nickname as writer, b.userno, b.count, b.likes
FROM info_notice b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno WHERE b.nid = #{nid}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO info_notice( title, regdate, moddate, content, userno ) VALUES( #{title}, NOW(), NOW(), #{content}, #{userno} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
